permissions: User must have access to the related job production plans via JobProductionPlanLocationPolicy scope (includes job production plans visible to the user) or be the seller operations contact on accepted broker tender job schedule shifts tied to those plans.
validation_notes: Filters match job production plan locations by related job production plan, segment, or broker tender job schedule shift.

flags.name: --job-production-plan
flags.description: Filter by job production plan ID (example: 123).

flags.name: --segment
flags.description: Filter by job production plan segment ID.

flags.name: --broker-tender-job-schedule-shift
flags.description: Filter by broker tender job schedule shift ID.
